title: 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runner, 10ft Rustic Sheer Runner Gauze Tablecloth Boho Wedding Decor Romantic Table Runner for Wedding Bridal Shower Birthday Party(35" x 118") (Terracotta)
descriptions:
**Advertising Description:**

Transform your table setting into a work of art with our 12 Pack Cheesecloth Table Runners! Measuring at an impressive length of 10ft (118 inches) and width of 35 inches, these rustic sheer runners are perfect for any occasion. Made from premium high-quality polyester, these table runners offer a soft, comfortable, durable texture that won't wear or tear easily. Each pack includes twelve pieces, making it an excellent choice for stocking up for multiple events or for larger tables.

Our cheesecloth table runners are not just limited to weddings or bridal showers; their multi-purpose use extends to holiday parties, birthday celebrations, restaurants, hotels, and even as chair cover sashes, decorative napkins, or gift wrapping! Their one-size-fits-most design ensures a perfect fit for most tables.

These table runners are easy to care for; simply hand wash or machine wash them gently using cold water and mild detergent. For your convenience, they do not require ironing. Experience the versatility of our cheesecloth table runners and elevate your event setting today! Don't hesitate to contact us with any questions you may have - we are here to help.
